entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Marathon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:27 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Marathon Airport 04:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
Temperature: -9.1°C
Pressure: 100.0 kPa
Humidity: 87 %
Wind Chill: -19
Dewpoint: -10.8°C
Wind: ENE 33 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow overnight. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 70 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 before morning. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 3. Forecast issued 6:48 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023
